title: Second division football leagues in Europe ranked by revenue 2011/12
summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Football League, and Income (in million euros) in each Football League on the y axis.
The Income (in million euros) is appeared to be the highest at Football League Championship (England) and lowest at Football League Segunda Division (Spain).
The highest Football League Championship (England) has 389.2 more Income (in million euros) than the lowest Football League Segunda Division (Spain).
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Income (in million euros) for 5 number of Football Leagues.
Football League Championship (England) has the highest Income (in million euros) and Segunda Division (Spain) has the lowest Income (in million euros).
mid_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Football League, and Income (in million euros) in each Football League on the y axis.
The Income (in million euros) is appeared to be the highest at Football League Championship (England) and lowest at Football League Segunda Division (Spain).
The highest Football League Championship (England) has 389.2 more Income (in million euros) than the lowest Football League Segunda Division (Spain).
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Football League in the x axis and Income (in million euros) in the y axis.
Football League Championship (England) has the highest Income (in million euros) and Segunda Division (Spain) has the lowest Income (in million euros).
Football League 2. Bundesliga (Germany) has the second highest value for Income (in million euros).
The highest Football League Championship (England) has 389.2 more Income (in million euros) than the lowest Football League Segunda Division (Spain).
Income (in million euros) at Football League Championship (England) is 590.3 , second place is 2. Bundesliga (Germany) at 361.7, and thirdly is Serie B (Italy) at 275.5.
The Football League Segunda Division (Spain) tends to be 1.8 percent lower than average.
